Replies.Reply: Yes I do. Keep it in your pants Rod.
Maybe you better just drive me home.
Yeah. I'm extremely worried about that. It's right up there with global warming.
I'm sorry, but you're not going to die a virgin Rod.
Rod? You're freaking me out. Game's over. I lose.
But you don't really mean it.
Let me just ask you a serious question first.
Aren't you worried you could die a virgin?
On our way home, a drunken driver could hit us head on and send us flying through the windshield. Terminate us instantly. We'd never experience what it means to make love.
Well I'm trying to be real here and you're mocking me.
I don't wanna take that chance.
Please get back in the car, Stacy.
I was supposed to be home fifteen minutes ago.
What? I WAS AT SANDY'S I JUST LOST TRACK OF TIME.
Dad ! Most of my friends can stay out until 11 on school nights and 1 on weekends!
I dunno. My dad never came home last night.
I'm fine. I've just never had someone my age die before.
I've been in the same class with Stacy for years but we weren't tight or anything.
No. Those two were together before Kenny and I started hanging out and that's over, what, God a year now.
Don't you want to talk to him?
You stare at him non-stop, like every lunch. Like this. Like most people stare at car accidents.
You eventually have to talk to him.
You're going to look really amoebic splitting off from me now.
If they had ever gone all the way?
You could tell him you really liked the way he chews with his back molars.
But you can't do any of it.
Mr. Jenkins called on me in class today. It was so embarrassing.
That I was sorry. I'd drifted off.
I was desperate. It was gross.
Maybe I should blister through a bottle of Tequila and just fuck his brains out.
You're the one always saying 'Just do it'.
I don't know what I'm so scared of.
How do you know what to type back when they start to cyber with you.
I promised I'd go right home after school.
Daddy! I DON'T THINK THIS IS ANY OF YOUR BUSINESS!
Daddy, are you upset that I'm still a virgin?!
Sandy, you have to chill out, at least two-thirds of the kids in our class are still virgins.
On what side of the family?
She said she was Kenny's aunt Lisa.
Nothing. I just picked up the phone to say goodbye to you. You didn't say goodbye.
You're thinking of sleeping with Mark tonight?
Didn't you have something a little more romantic in mind for your first time?
Yeah. I think it's really sick.
Three of our classmates are dead.
I'm so flattered but I can't.
I'm not using him as an excuse.
I have to go home after school.
I need to ask you something.
Have you ever heard of someone named Lisa Sherman?
I overheard daddy mentioning her to someone. I he thinks she's the killer.
No but he got really weird.
No. I think she lived her a long time ago. Like twenty-eight years ago. When dad was eighteen.
Hi Miss Dunlop. Where do you keep the old town papers?
Mom? You were spying on me.
Whoever tried to kill me was made up to look exactly like this picture of Lisa Sherman, clothes and all. I think that concerns me.
You going to drag me out and me in my room until I go to college?
I'm not leaving. I want to know why you and dad are so freaked out. Three of my classmates are dead.
People thought these guys had a right to rape her because she called them 'queers'?
The men. Do any of them still live around here?
THAT'S why he called Mr. Sisler first.
My dad acts like he's Johnny Fucking Perfect and he's really Johnny Fucking Rapist.
I can't believe I listened to one word of his shit.
So I should feel happy that he got away with it?
Let's just start a party right here, right fucking now.
What's wrong? Am I doing something wrong?
I'm making you feel like meat?
You break up with me because I won't fuck you.
You flaunt some slut in my face.
And when I finally agree to spread my legs, you accuse me of treating you like meat.
Then go to the party. Run with the herd Kenny. Just don't spew out all that 'be an individual, assert yourself' crap anymore.
Ok. Should I put my bike in the back of your car?
You think I should go to the party, Mr. Marliston?
What do you know about my father?
I can't walk. I think he cut right through a tendon.
Thanks for coming back for me.
Jimmy leave him alone! He's imbalanced.
Please! You wouldn't kill your sister, would you?
We have the same color eyes.
Oh God, this is the way it should be.
Fuck your curfew. Most sixth graders can stay out later than you.
You know, maybe we ought to start seeing other people.
Jody, we've been going out for over a year. I love you but I'm all out of patience.
Nobody wants to be the fourth.
You know I want to go with you.
Everyone's grounded. There's a killer on the loose.
If you don't want to go with me just say so. Say 'Kenny, I DON'T WANT TO MAKE LOVE TO YOU' but don't use your dad as an excuse. I'm so sick of it.
Yes you are. You always do.
I feel like I NEED YOU DAD'S permission just to kiss you.
They're not picking me up until six.
I think this is a big part of growing up.
But if he'd been sent to jail, there would be no Jody.
I don't know. I kind of am.
Are you coming to the party?
Just making me feel like a piece of meat.
That's not why we broke up.
Jody, you're only doing this to get back at your dad. It doesn't have that much to do with me.
I'm scared. Three kids are dead. I want to go to this party.
There's going to be very few virgins left in school on Monday.
Jody was right, this party IS sick.
Oh, hey Mr. Marliston. W-What's Jody's bike doing on your front porch?
Alright, Marliston, I know she's here.
He's dead! We've got to get the fuck out of here!
Quick! In the house. He won't look for us in there.
Come on. Lets get out of here.
Your curfew is 9:30 and you know it, little miss.
You said that two weeks ago.
They're not all the sheriff's daughter.
Two kids were found mutilated in the woods. Lock the door after me.
What kind of a person wakes up in the morning and says to themselves, 'Think I'll nail a sixteen year old girl to a tree today'?
But I am going to have to question all of their past boyfriends and girlfriends.
I just wanted to check that you were okay?
How well did you know Stacy and Rod?
Had either of them broken up with someone recently?
I want you to head right home after school.
Why'd you send for Lenny Marliston?
So you just don't point blank ask your teenage daughter about sex.
Nice to meet you too. My daughter speaks highly of you.
I have a question to ask you.
I need to know how far you and Kenny went?
Well, I assume you let him kiss you?
_ Did you two get any further?
I wouldn't ask if I didn't have to.
You never went, uh, all the way?
I am. I'm so very proud of you. Go back to sleep.
No. Let her get at least one more peacefully night's sleep.
If I'd gone public with this yesterday Annette Michaels might be alive today.
I'm going to tell them everything I know.
Better than a pile of dead teenagers.
I think you all know why I CALLED THIS Town meeting. In the last two days, three of our children have been murdered and it appears that we have now established a common link between the killings.
All three of the victims attended our public high school and all three were or appear to have been...um...virgins.
We found the word 'virgin' written at both crime scenes.
We didn't think this was a serial killer.
I think that's' up to each and everyone of you.
IT'S LISA SHERMAN. But she still looks like we're eighteen.
I swear to God. It's her.
Ok. Goodbye. Now get back to school.
There's a Lisa Shermer living just sixty miles west of here. Over the Indiana border.
Put a squad car at every entrance to town.
I can't talk to her now.
Tell her she has to handle it.
I like the idea of all the kids in one place. If it happens, just keep a man outside until you hear from me.
You know where I can find her?
Can you describe her? How old was she?
I knew Lisa Sherman long ago.
Is there a picture of her somewhere?
Tom? Lisa Sherman is dead. But you'll never believe what I found out. Meet me at the Roadhouse on Route nine in a half hour. We need to talk in private.
She just turned off her light.
I don't know. Where did you hear that name.
Did he say anything else about her?
I want you to come home with me right now, Jody.
She's nobody you should be concerned with.
If I have to. Please let me protect you.
Years ago, something horrible happened in this town. When I was still in high school. A girl named Elizabeth Sherman was attacked by four drunken seniors.
She was raped. At least that's what she claimed.
No, I believed her. She was in pretty bad shape. Inside and out.
They were children of our leading citizens, stars of the football team.
They were proving to her they weren't.
EVERYONE JUST KIND OF LOOKED THE OTHER WAY.
I don't know. We just did. I guess I was kind of scared going against the gain.
Two men left town right after it happened.
Mr. Sisler was one of them.
God. It's like everything that was ever repressed in this town is suddenly bubbling up through the ground.
Not a day has gone by where your father has not torn himself to shreds for what happened. We both have...
He dedicated his life to law enforcement after...
Her parents reported her missing about an hour ago.
The same type that decides to carve into her stomach.
We need you here. I can bring her in.
As bizarre as it may sound, seems someone is planning to have a big party tonight.
Should we close down any eruption?
We're seeing all the signs in town.
Call Brent on the horn. See where he is. What he wants us to do. I'll head over to the school.
Don't leave this party until you hear from me.
No. Hell, it's the quietest goddamn party I've ever seen.
Witness the L.A. Riots. Years of police brutality in forty-eight hours. Jody?
You aren't planning to tell these kids that 'virgin' was tattooed into both Stacy and Rod, are you?
Fine, just don't mention the carving This is going to be a tough enough day as it is.
Could you tell Mr. Marliston we'd like to see him.
The kids adore him. They confide in him. His patchouli reeking rear might know if Stacy and Rod were really virgins. Why didn't you ask Jody that?
Why not? You worried you might find out how much she actually knows?
Come in Leonard. Have you met Brent Marken?
Oh GOD Brent, is there anything you don't feel guilty about?
Focus on the present. You always want to change the past. Let's figure out what you are going to tell the parents today, not what you should told them yesterday.
You tell these people someone is out there killing virgins and we're going to have a goddamn fuckfest on our hands.
No but I've always wanted to.
We have the same color eyes.
You can tell me all about it in my office. Calm down. We're all on edge today.
My house is just a couple of blocks away. Why don't you come on over and clean those cuts up.
You aren't going to the party?
I really do. For your own safety.
We're all manipulated. From the moment we're born. The event that fatalistically shaped my life happened before I was even born.
Yes. We have no real freedom.
I was born nine months after she was raped. One of the four men who raped her is my father. I have no idea which one.
Yes that's the whole point. This is what I was put on this earth to do.

'It's a family affair, It's a family affair.'  He undoes the blanket revealing the battered but still breathing body of Jody's dad. Brent's bleeding from the forehead, nose, and mouth. He's badly beaten up.
Well, we may be family One in four chance.
Sheriff Brent, you will be the second of the four horsemen of the apocalypse to die. But first you will watch as I slice up your little girl.
My mother said, after you and your three droogs raped her Brent, that people in town refused to let her use their bathrooms.
Open your eyes Brent. Watch. Or will I cause her much more pain.
Who the fuck is breaking into my house?
My wallet's on the mantle when you've finished your rifling, Kenny.
That all depends Kenny. Depends on why the FUCK you've broken into your history teacher's house?
What are you talking about? No one here but us chickens.
You really are a god damn rube.
'Family affair. Oh yes it's a family affair'.
I'm sure you should have failed.
Please get out of my way or I'll have to hurt you.

Leonard winds back, slashes at Jimmy, lopping off his dick. Blood flies up, splatters across Jimmy's face. Jimmy screams. Leonard slashes open his neck. Blood splatters everywhere, on kid's backs, faces, butts.
Come on! These are eighty dollar INDEPENDENT khakis! Limited Edition! God damn it!
I don't watch him eat everyday.
The seat behind him is open. Come on, I can eavesdrop too.
Why? All my mom and dad ever do is watch each other eat and they've been married for twenty years.
What am I supposed to say?
You're so fucking lucky your dad is the sheriff.
You get to be a little Chelsea Clinton. Everyone wants to meet you. Party with you. Have sex with you.
He's just trying to mess with your head. Ignore him.
I doubt it. Who'd want to fuck her. She probably reeks worse than the docks down in those panties.
Personally I think he has a deep, almost pathological desire to corrupt you. But I suppose that's a type of love.
That was before he pulled this 'Dick me or I dump you' shit. I say fuck his best friend.
Want to come in for awhile?
I keep a couple of my dad's porno books hidden in my desk for emergency reference.
What are we going to do?
There will be a lot fewer by tomorrow night.
You watch. There's going to be a hymen holocaust tomorrow.
Oh my god. ARE YOU OK?
Mark, if you brought a Twinkie today?
Yeah I was talking about Twinkies the other day and I realized I hadn't had one in years. Then I remembered seeing you with one.
Hurricane Hormone. it's flattened the whole school. Guess what?
Mark invited me to the party.
It's like a pop your cherry party.
Unless he makes a move during seventh period.
I kind of like the idea that we can all lose it together, on the same night.
Kenny'll want to go with you.
Jody, you have to go to the party.
You're the one who's hand is shaking.
Did your dad question you this morning?
I wonder why it's so important to know if they fucked?
If I'm so all-used-up Ben, why do you try to hook me up non-stop?
Your mind is just twisted enough.
What do you want to know?
You have to do everything Boys are totally clueless when it comes to sex.
It starts with them trying to unhook our bras, fumbling around, and never changes. Wait until they try to put their dicks in you.
Always. Unless you want them to just poke around endlessly.
Ok not your imports. All your other CDS and your K2 snowboard.
Did he ask you if Stacy and Rod has ever exchanged bodily fluids?
What I don't understand is why they asked Marliston if Rod was a virgin. They could have asked you Cindy.
Exactly. Then he must be a virgin.
There's a better chance that he got head from all five Spice Girls.
Me too. I'm going to start telling people that I saw her drop to her knees and latch on to his unit vector.
I would if Dylan paid me.
You want me to die? I thought you and I were tight.
You wonder about that everyday Sandy?
That's an awful lot for ten minutes of beasting?
He should. Four guys hit on me today, and not because they find me intellectually stimulating.
Dylan's been telling people that Annette gave him a blow job.
Actually, my mom always packs two.
You can have both if you want.
I'm Lisa Sherman. Dylan's aunt. He asked me to come talk to you.
He feels terrible about those things he said to you in school.
I think I know how to restore your reputation.
Can I come in? I'll need to use the phone.
Yes. He asked me to come over and talk to you.
I'm willing to help save her life.
Just think of it like she's having a flu shot. Purely preventive.

A series of savage killings has turned this small community of Cherry Falls, Ohio inside out. In the last two days, three teenagers have been killed, a fourth attacked. The killer seems to be targeting high school virgins. Here's our WWJB reporter Mike Stanton outside the local high school with an up to the minute report.
Sir, we're getting calls from other towns. Boys throughout the country have heard about what's going on here and they're heading our way, apparently, looking for girls.
Hi Jody. What can I DO for you?
Everyone's getting ready for the party.
Of course. NO ONE EVER SHUTS UP IN THE LIBARY. Kids were whispering about it all day.
Not at all. In fact, I thought about going.
You're sweet. I really wish someone had thrown a party like that when I was your age. My life might have been very different.
A bullet to the right cerebellum.
No. She ate a pistol for lunch one day.
I never met the woman. I'm just taking care of the place until they sell it.
I don't give a fuck what your reasons are. You pay me ten dollars, you can go inside Otherwise, get a warrant.
Couldn't tell she going to off herself, huh?
I've been in a lot of people's houses and this one's the creepiest.
People always keep their secrets in their attics or in their basements. All the weirdness in this house took place in the basement.
They look like they'd fit you.
Shh. I'm not going to tell you not to go.
Another kid raids his parents weed stash, grabbing a handful of buds.
A third kid raided his parents medicine cabinet. Lots of barbiturates in this house.
I guess so. Luckily we won't have that problem.
You can't just leave me here.
The GERMAN SHEPARD that lives in the house comes charging out of the dog door towards them, barking and snarling.
Tom Sisler. He was murdered at school.
Nope. The switchboard is lightning up downtown.
But I shouldn't shut it down?
Jesus Christ had balls in his soup, Marliston, what'd you do, eat out a pizza or something? What the fuck happened to your face?
I was grounded for two fucking months because of you!
I knew you were a pervert.
So am I! I'm gonna rip your cock off Marliston!
